entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET location not found in ubuntu 22.04 #74688
  • Mono interpreter doesn't handle mutating `newobj` values through aliases #74687
  • Regex returning invalid match #74686
  • COSE needs to enforce that only NIST P-{256,384,521} are used #74684
    7.0.0
  • [Quality Week] Improve quality of Crossgen2 testing, most notably in context of library tests #74681
  • [NativeAOT] Need to add support on Unix for recursive Crst #74680
  • [NativeAOT] Lock up at process shutdown on Windows when process has many threads #74678
  • Regression: Items are not being evicted from MemoryCache in .NET 6 #74676
  • [JIT] Assertion Prop Issues and Ideas #74671
    Future
  • Mono crash in System.Net.Requests tests on linux-arm64 #74667
  • IDBFS is Not defined #74664
  • UriBuilder should percent-encode its UserName or Password properties #74662
  • Clang LLVM emitting float instrinsics for bitwise operation for every input #74661
  • SqliteException: SQLite Error 1: 'no such table: Movie' #74659
  • [wasm-mt] Issues with enabling threads in .NET 7 RC 1 #74654
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: FormattableStringBuilder #74653
  • Using `StringValues` with `JsonSerializerContext` produces warnings with `7.0.0-preview*` #74652
    8.0.0
  • IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication path changes between Xamarin.iOS and dotnet 6 builds on iOS #74642
  • firefox-DebuggerTests - TaskCanceledException in random tests #74640
  • Side effects of boxing are getting removed #74635
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V1.2-M02\\b28158\\b28158_64\\b28158_64.cmd #74632
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalPauseDuration\\GetTotalPauseDuration.cmd #74631
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient creates Quic threads even if HTTP/3 is not in use #74629
  • The mono_marshal_ilgen_init symbol is private in libmonosgen-2.0.dylib #74628
    7.0.0
  • ComWrappersTestsBuiltInComDisabled failing with NativeAOT #74620
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Throw helpers should return the valid value back #70515
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a few overloads to StringBuilder to eliminate temp allocs #68450
    Future
  • Move host customization logic into Microsoft.NET.HostModel #3580
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a feature to indicate an attribute is used to drive code generation #58994
    Future
  • Consider adding ArgumentEmptyException #59273
    Future
  • Matrix4x4 class only works on Windows #61178
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `charsRequired` out parameter to `TryParse` methods #62115
    Future
  • Can't find compatible framework message should specify x86/x64 on Windows #3592
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Improve the performance of enumerating over interface types. #62266
    Future
  • Move test_fx_ver under the cli/test folder #3515
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow set/get access to Array elements by absolute index. #62795
    Future
  • Refactor core-setup host code for understandability, maintainability #3153
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Create an interface for types with not-null returning ToString #68779
    Future
  • API Proposal: Generic System.Math Functions #63732
    Future
  • There are no dedicated DateOnly and TimeOnly type converters #74682
  • Implicit Vector/Tuple conversions #68145
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ISpanFormattable destination length #68154
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfZero() #68339
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: New Method: Enum.HasAnyFlag(Enum) #69262
    Future
  • Process.StandardOutput.Peek() hangs when StandardOutput contains no data. #74677
  • system.collections.concurrent.tests failed in CI #73038
    8.0.0
  • `System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests` failing with NRE in `S.T.Tasks.ConcurrentExclusiveSchedulerPair.ProcessConcurrentTasks` #73433
    Future
  • DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress fails in CI #73405
  • Failures in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 #73930
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: Allow alternate names for ActivatorUtilityConstructorAttribute #74655
  • JIT - slow generated code on Release for iterating simple array of struct #4659
    Future
  • `optAssertionProp_Ind` should eliminate `GTF_EXCEPT` better. #32248
    Future
  • [QUIC] Long running test: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #73377
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml.Tests Fails on Android #50870
    Future
  • JIT: Optimize "X & 1 == 0" to "X & 1" #61412
    Future
  • Protection against assembly tampering #74569
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.Tests Fails on Android #50878
    Future
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on .NET MAUI Android, but on .NET MAUI Windows and Xamarin.Forms Android #74576
    8.0.0
  • HttpClientHandler.AllowAutoRedirect is not working as expected on servers #74548
    8.0.0
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket not implemented on Unix #1483
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74679
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74675
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74674
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix stack unwinding for NativeAOT on Unix x64 #74673
    os-linux, arch-x64, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the result for PowMod is fully initialized #74672
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] Use the regType for extracting the RegisterType #74670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Skip System.Net.Requests tests on mono linux-arm64 #74668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Nick to fabric-bot config #74666
    area-Meta
  • Mark certain compiler-created locals as aliased #74665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Annotate System.Runtime.Serialization for AOT warnings #74663
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [MONO] Make mono_marshal_ilgen_init a public MONO_API function again #74660
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [MONO] Make mono_marshal_ilgen_init a public MONO_API function again #74658
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [draft] Update il range in optOptimizeBoolsUpdateTrees #74657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #50866 enable configuration functional test on android #74651
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74648
    area-System.Transactions
  • #50868 enable configuration json tests on Android #74647
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket support on Unix, Review Changes #74645
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Fix possible stack overflow in HttpListener #74644
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add `[NotNullIfNotNull]` to conversions from `string` to `JsonNode`. #74643
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Pass /NOEXP /NOIMPLIB options to the linker when publishing native AOT .exes #74641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74638
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm-mt] Log exit codes in browser samples to prevent tests from timeouting #74637
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Don't crash on recursive native layout #74630
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pass over interop tests with NativeAOT #74627
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make special_sweep_p a per heap member #74625
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Enable Console Logging test in NativeAOT #74381
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix some issues in `coreclr/nativeaot/docs/interop.md` #74656
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74450
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove unneeded references to JsonTypeInfo.PropertyInfoForTypeInfo. #74594
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • avoid allocation X509Chain if there is no certificate #74616
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • fix MaxResponseHeadersLength tests #74479
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Forward-substitute long calls on 32 bit targets #74502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Move linux-bionic leg to runtime-extra-platforms #74621
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure that the result for PowMod is fully initialized #74585
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on all configs #74636
  • [release/7.0] Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74649
    area-System.Transactions
  • Move Mono FreeBSD and Linux armv6 legs to the runtime-community pipeline #74622
  • `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` block Vector types #74612
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix typo in reflection test #74610
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Testing builds with v3beta pool - newer MacOS #74609
  • #50870 Enabling Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml tests on android #74575
    os-android, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • #50878 enable StringSegment tests on Android #74556
    os-android, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Issue was that if a BGC thread handles a mark stack overflow, #74571
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update documentation for analyzing PR failures #74615
    area-Meta
  • Always maintain committed_by_oh when heap_hard_limit is set #74624
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow address == g_gc_highest_address in get_skewed_basic_region_index_for_address #74543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 (#74211)" #74617
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Do not run DynamicGenerics test on mac #74618
  • CI: Tighten the path based triggers for jobs #74534
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V3 #73233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Show a warning when an explicit package reference to ILCompiler is added #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74614
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Convert SHFileOperation error to Win IO error #74607
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, community-contribution
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74366
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption #74611
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74567
    area-System.Memory, runtime-mono
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add custom comparer to use incremental generator caching for LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator #74558
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix to skip adding self as next unrelated code list #74208
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wasm.build.tests for net6, net7 workloads #74608
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74560
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
